config.customHeadCode:
<style>
.card {
  will-change: transform;
  margin: 8px;
  position: relative;
  border-radius: 2px;
  overflow: hidden;
  background-color: #fafafa;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  -webkit-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.37);
}

</style>


<style>

.kpf.card.top {
    margin: 0;
    border-radius: 6px 6px 0 0;
}

.kpf.card.bottom {
    margin: 0 0 10px 0;
    padding: 5px;
    border-radius: 0 0 6px 6px;
}

.kpf.card.middle {
    margin: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
    color: #444444;
}
.kpf.card.full {
    border-radius: 6px;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    margin-bottom: 30px;
}

/*quick links*/
.quickLinks {
    width: 86px !important;
    height: 390px !important;
    position: fixed;
    right: 25px;
    bottom: 10%;
    
    border-radius: 6px;
    z-index: 999;
    
}
.quickLinks .lt-layout-item {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.quickLinks .lt-layout-item:last-of-type {
    border: none;
}

.quickLinks .lt-layout-item.closeBtn {
    position: absolute;
    top: -30px;
    right: 5px;
    width: 16px;
    height: 16px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.quickLinks .lt-link-tile {
    width: 56px;
    height: 56px;
    margin: 5px;
    padding: 0;
    position: relative;
}
.quickLinks .lt-layout-item.closeBtn .lt-link-tile {
    width: 16px;
    height: 16px;
}

/*end quick links*/




/* Medium devices (desktops, 992px and up) */
@media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
    .frameLeft {
        width: 135px; 
    }
   .topFrame, .footerFrame, .right {
        margin-left: 120px;
    }
}
</style>

<style>
    	 
              .rounded-corner {
    border-radius: 3px;
}
              .drop-shadow{
                  -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.41);
-moz-box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.41);
box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.41);
              }
</style>
config.customFootCode:
<style>
   
   .border {
    border: 1px solid black;
}

.card {
  will-change: transform;
  margin: 8px;
  position: relative;
  border-radius: 2px;
  overflow: hidden;
  
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  -webkit-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.37);
}

    img.nav-logo {
    height: 50px;
    padding-top: 0px;
    padding-bottom: 0px;
}
.lt-tile-nav-menu-hamburger {
    height: 50px;
}
.lt-tile-nav-menu-hamburger>.lt-hamburger-animated {
    top: 3px;
}
.slick-dots li {
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: solid 1px white;
}

.lt-news-list-slide {
    position: relative;
}

.lt-news-list-image {
    height: 100%;
    width: 60%;
    left: 40%;
    position: absolute;
}

.lt-news-list-content:after {
    content: '';
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-bottom: 400px solid #D62C27;
    border-right: 110px solid transparent;
    position: absolute;
    left: 40%;
    top: 0px;
}

.lt-news-list-content {
    height: 100%;
    width: 40%;
}

.slick-dots {
    left: 40px;
    bottom: 20px;
    top: initial !important;
    right: initial !important;
}

.slick-dots .slick-active {
    color: #D62C27 !important;
    background-color: white !important;
}


.lt-embed-tile {
	border: 0;
}

  body{
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

.drop-shadow {
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.41);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.41);
	box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.41);
}

.rounded-corner {
	border-radius: 3px;
}
.no-margin-bottom .lt-responsive-item{
	margin-bottom:0;
}
.btn-align-left .lt-tile-container div{
	text-align:left;
}
.costum-btn p{
	border:1.5px solid #fff;
	color:#fff;
	padding: 10px 20px;
	min-width:200px;
	border-radius: 3px;
	display:inline-block;
	text-align: left;
	cursor:pointer;
}
.costum-btn.costum-btn-primary p{
	border:1.5px solid rgb(69, 152, 127);
	background-color: rgb(69, 152, 127);
	color: #fff;
}

.costum-btn p:hover{
	border:1.5px solid rgb(85,88,175);
	color:#fff;
	background-color:rgb(85,88,175);
}

.card {
	will-change: transform;
  	margin: 8px;
  	position: relative;
  	border-radius: 2px;
  	overflow: hidden;
  	background-color: #fafafa;
  	height: 100%;
  	width: 100%;
  	-webkit-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  	transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  	box-shadow: 0 1px 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.37);
}


.lt-bar-nav-menu{
	text-align:right; 
	padding-top: 20px;
}
.lt-bar-nav-menu ul.lt-root-list li a {
    padding: 10px;
	text-transform:uppercase;
	//color: rgba(20,97,91, 1) !important;
	cursor:pointer;
}

.lt-bar-nav-menu ul.lt-root-list li a:hover{
	//color: rgb(85,88,175) !important;
}


.carded-content .lt-responsive-col{
	background-color:#fff;
	margin-bottom:20px;
	transition: box-shadow .2s ease-in;
	border-radius:6px;
	border:1px solid red;

}
.carded-content .lt-responsive-col:hover{
	box-shadow: 0 0 0 rgba(37,56,88,0);
    
}
.carded-content .lt-responsive-item{
	//margin-bottom:0;
}







</style>
